data.description_html:
This spell functions like lesser spell matrix, except that you can store up to two spells of up to 3rd level, and you take 2d6 points of damage instead of 1d6 upon casting. The matrix closes after 2 rounds and no more spells can be added, even if it is not full.

In addition, you can decide to link the two spells stored in the matrix into a spell sequence if both are 2nd level or lower. You can then discharge the two linked spells as a single swift action, just as if you were casting the lone spell from a spell matrix.

Focus: A sapphire with a minimum value of 1,000 gp.
data.effect: Matrix that holds two of your spells
data.name: Spell Matrix
